title: Chris Kanich · Homepage
contents:
Chris Kanich    I am an Associate Professor at the University of Illinois at Chicago in the Department of Computer Science .  Contact information:   in person:  room 1308 SEO  Spring 2020 office hours: 1pm-3pm Mondays, and by appointment (email me!)    snail mail:  University of Illinois at Chicago Dept. Computer Science Room 1120 SEO (M/C 152) Chicago, IL 60607    email: ckanich@uic.edu  phone: 312-355-0950 (email is vastly preferred)  twitter: @kaytwo  github: @kaytwo       What I look like    Research interests   I conduct data-driven research on the socio-technical aspects of
cybersecurity. This research includes characterizing the shifting long-term
privacy needs of Internet users, better understanding the extent to which deep
learning threatens user security and privacy on the web, as well as the
practical impact of security-centric tools like Single Sign-On and VPNs for
users and non-users alike.  I am very interested in new collaborations, motivated students, and lively
conversation regarding security research - please reach out via email or
twitter if you’d like to chat!     Selected media coverage   Our feature usage paper on The Provocateur Podcast , July 31 2017  Cloudsweeper on Science Friday , July 12 2013  Show Me the Money in The Economist , Oct 15th 2011  Click Trajectories in The New York Times (and the editorial ), May 2011  Spamalytics in Wired magazine , March 2011      Students   Ph.D. students:   Mir Masood Ali  Sara Amini  Mohammad Ghasemisharif  Awais Jafar  Mohammad Taha Khan  John Kristoff  Joel Miller  Shubham Singh   Ph.D. alums:   Peter Snyder -> Brave Software   Alums:   Sruti Bhagavatula -> CMU  Joshua Castor  Sangeeta Chowdhary -> Rutgers  Bradley Golden  Oliver Hui  Lubna Mirza  Dan Moreno  Alex Pieczynski  Natasha Rice  Weiheng Alex Ruan  Arthur Smirnov  Moin Vahora   Advice for prospective students     Teaching    CS 361: Computer Systems Fall 2019  Fall 2018 Spring 2016 Spring 2015  CS 450: Computer Networks Spring 2018  Spring 2017  Fall 2015  Fall 2014  Fall 2013  Spring 2013  CS 491: Secure Web Application Development Fall 2017  Spring 2020  CS 568: Advanced Security & Online Privacy Spring 2019  CS 594: Beyond the Dark Side of Data Spring 2014  CS 594: Empirical Analysis Fall 2016      Professional Program Committee, NDSS : 2014, 2018  Program Committee, ACSAC : 2013, 2017  Program Committee, USENIX Security : 2014, 2017  Program Committee, WEIS : 2017  Program Committee, LASER Workshop : 2016  Program Committee, WWW Conference : 2016  Program Committee, ACM CCS : 2015, 2016  Area Editor, ACM SIGCAS Computers and Society newsletter: 2015-present  Program Committee, RAID Symposium : 2015  Program Co-Chair, CSET : 2013, 2014  Program Committee, DIMVA Conference : 2014  Publicity Chair, IEEE Security & Privacy Workshops : 2014  Program Committee, HotCloud : 2013  Program Committee, CSET : 2012      Selected publications   Mainack Mondal, Günce Su Yilmaz, Noah Hirsch, Mohammad Taha Khan, Michael Tang, Christopher Tran, Chris Kanich, Blase Ur, and Elena Zheleva, “ Moving Beyond Set-It-And-Forget-It Privacy Settings on Social Media ,” in Proceedings of the 2019 ACM SIGSAC Conference on Computer and Communications Security , 2019, pp. 991–1008.  PDF   Mohammad Taha Khan, Joe DeBlasio, Chris Kanich, Geoffrey M. Voelker, Alex C. Snoeren, and Narseo Vallina-Rodriguez, “ An Empirical Analysis of the Commercial VPN Ecosystem ,” in Proceedings of the ACM Internet Measurement Conference , 2018.  PDF   Mohammad Ghasemisharif, Amrutha Ramesh, Stephen Checkoway, Chris Kanich, and Jason Polakis, “ O Single Sign-Off, Where Art Thou? PDF   Ameya Hanamsagar, Simon Woo, Chris Kanich, and Jelena Mirkovic, “ Leveraging Semantic Transformation to Investigate Password Habits and Their Causes ,” in Proceedings of the ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems , 2018. PDF   Sara Amini, Vahid Noroozi, Sara Bahaadini, S Yu Philip, and Chris Kanich, “ DeepFP: A Deep Learning Framework For User Fingerprinting via Mobile Motion Sensors ,” in 2018 IEEE International Conference on Big Data (Big Data) , 2018, pp. 84–91. PDF   Jason W. Clark, Peter Snyder, Damon McCoy, and Chris Kanich, “ I Saw Images I Didn’t Even Know I Had: Understanding User Perceptions of Cloud Storage Privacy ,” in Proceedings of the 33rd Annual ACM Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems , 2015. PDF   Chris Kanich, Christian Kreibich, Kirill Levchenko, Brandon Enright, Geoffrey M.
